column1: #Text=Aang says : " You guys are going to love Omashu .
#Text=What kind of slum do you think this is ?!
#Text=" Gate guard says : " State your business !
#Text=" Aang says : " My business is my business , young man , and none of yours !
#Text=I 've got half a mind to bend you over my knee and paddle your backside !
#Text=" Gate guard says : " Settle down , old timer !
#Text=" Aang says : " Name 's Bonzu Pippinpaddleopsicopolis , the Third , and these are my grandkids .
#Text=" Gate guard says : " You seem like a responsible young lady .
#Text=See that your grandfather stays out of trouble .
#Text=" Gate guard says : " Wait a minute !
#Text=Show some respect for the elderly and carry your grandfather 's bag !
